I am an Economist at the [Development Impact Evaluation (DIME)](https://www.worldbank.org/en/research/dime) group at the World Bank.

I obtained my PhD at the [Business and Public Policy Group (BPP)](https://haas.berkeley.edu/bpp/) at UC Berkeley Haas School of Business.

My research areas are Development and Public Economics. I am interested in studying the design, implementation and evaluation of public policies in low- and middle-income countries, with a focus on taxation, public procurement and state personnel policy.
